news.title: €1.5bn in tax cuts announced for Budget 2026 as Donohoe warns of ‘trade-offs’ over costly Vat reduction for hospitality industry
news.summary: The Finance Minister has sounded a warning over the “trade-offs” of costly tax cuts for the hospitality industry in October’s Budget.

news.title: Former prominent sports figure charged over 79 alleged sexual offences against minors
news.summary: A former prominent sports industry figure has appeared in court charged with almost 80 sexual offences against minors in south Dublin spanning a decade.

news.title: Convicted killer remains ‘seriously ill’ after savage Mountjoy Prison attack
news.summary: A convicted killer who was savagely beaten in Mountjoy Prison in early June remains seriously ill in hospital, a court was told this week.

news.title: Young Waterford cyclist dies in electrocution incident on Tour de France trip
news.summary: A young Waterford cyclist has died in France after suffering an electrocution in a Paris Metro station.

news.title: Former Armagh GAA captain Aidan Nugent ordered to stand trial in the North over eight sexual assault charges
news.summary: Armagh All-Ireland winner Aidan Nugent was today ordered to stand trial in the North on eight charges of sexual assault.

news.title: Jury in Niall Gilligan trial asks judge 'what is the next step if we are not unanimous?'
news.summary: The jury of seven men and five women in the assault trial of former All-Star and Clare All-Ireland winning hurler, Niall Gilligan are to continue their deliberations on Wednesday.

news.title: Six-week-old infant among 15 people who died of starvation in Gaza in past 24 hours, health officials say
news.summary: A six-week-old infant was among 15 people who have died of starvation in Gaza in the past 24 hours, local health officials said, with malnutrition now killing Palestinians faster than at any point in the 21-month war.

news.title: Mary Regan: Trump’s tariff threats loom large over budget plans, but building will take priority
news.summary: Summer Economic Statements, which outline the tax and spending plans for the budget cycle ahead, tend to always come with a health warning.

news.title: Lucinda O’Sullivan’s restaurant review: Stunning seafood, heavenly brown bread and the best chowder make this new Galway spot a must-visit
news.summary: Oranmore is to Galway what Kinsale is to Cork, Dún Laoghaire to Dublin, Tramore to Waterford, and Bangor to Belfast – a popular coastal commutable town, in this case on the shores of Galway Bay.
